第25届美国制片人工会奖(2014)

director.name: 塞巴斯蒂安·荣格尔 Sebastian Junger

this_title: Which Way Is The Front Line From Here? The Life and Time of Tim Hetherington
trans_title: 战争的前线在哪方？蒂姆·赫瑟林顿传奇的一生
从这往哪走是去战争前线？蒂姆·赫瑟林顿传奇的一生
introduction: On April 20, 2011, shortly after the release of his documentary RESTREPO - and only six weeks after attending the Oscar ceremony as a nominee - photographer and filmmaker Tim Hetherington was killed by mortar fire in the city of Misrata, Libya, where he'd been covering the civil war. He bled out in the back of a pick-up truck while being raced to the hospital, comforted by a Spanish photojournalist who was holding his hand and trying to keep him awake. Those moments ended a brilliant ten-year career in which Hetherington not only covered such dramatic frontline stories as Liberia and Afghanistan, but also transcended the conventional boundaries of image-making to become one of the most important journalists of his generation. (c) Official FB
